ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:08:15 [Issue ID 4000-56615] urn:comicvine:4000-56615 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 22:41:28. [Issue ID 75238]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Muggsy brags about all his accomplished relatives, but it turns out he really can get the boys into the Air Show -- his cousin is the ticket-taker.
Pete and Oscar try to play a trick on Detective Fraidy but the tables are turned on them.
Chip tries to get Nip to trade his new car for Chip's old one.
Doodles tries to get Lemuel to stop exaggerating until he learns how easy it is to do.
The boys try to con Lanny but somehow they get tricked.
ComicInfo.Tags: McSnurtle The Turtle,Chip,Rudy Raccoon,Raccoon Kids,Nip,Binky Biggs,Fraidy Cat,Rollo Raccoon,Mugsy Mole,Doodles Duck
ComicInfo.Title: Defective Detective
